# Key jumps (same MM-DD)
 4y jump: 2020-06-21 -> 2024-06-21 (civil delta=1461)
  - gregorian       kin= 63 (Δ161)  sign= 3 (Δ 1)  tone=11 (Δ 5)
  - leap_intercalary kin= 61 (Δ160)  sign= 1 (Δ 0)  tone= 9 (Δ 4)
  - leap_double     kin= 65 (Δ162)  sign= 5 (Δ 2)  tone=13 (Δ 6)
 8y jump: 2020-06-21 -> 2028-06-21 (civil delta=2922)
  - gregorian       kin=224 (Δ 62)  sign= 4 (Δ 2)  tone= 3 (Δ10)
  - leap_intercalary kin=221 (Δ 60)  sign= 1 (Δ 0)  tone=13 (Δ 8)
  - leap_double     kin=227 (Δ 64)  sign= 7 (Δ 4)  tone= 6 (Δ12)
16y jump: 2020-06-21 -> 2036-06-21 (civil delta=5844)
  - gregorian       kin= 26 (Δ124)  sign= 6 (Δ 4)  tone=13 (Δ 7)
  - leap_intercalary kin= 21 (Δ120)  sign= 1 (Δ 0)  tone= 8 (Δ 3)
  - leap_double     kin= 31 (Δ128)  sign=11 (Δ 8)  tone= 5 (Δ11)

# Subcycle period hints (years)
gregorian:
  period(kin)   = (none <=64y)
  period(sign)  = (none <=64y)
  period(tone)  = (none <=64y)
  period(group) = (none <=64y)
leap_intercalary:
  period(kin)   = 52
  period(sign)  = 4
  period(tone)  = 13
  period(group) = 4
leap_double:
  period(kin)   = (none <=64y)
  period(sign)  = (none <=64y)
  period(tone)  = (none <=64y)
  period(group) = (none <=64y)
